descriptions: Student fails to identify or inaccurately identifies different accounts of the subject in different mediums.
Student identifies different accounts but struggles to recognize the mediums in which they are presented.
Student identifies different accounts and their mediums but shows difficulty in understanding the basic differences between them.
Student accurately identifies different accounts and their mediums and begins to understand the variations in details presented.
Student effectively identifies different accounts and their mediums, demonstrating a clear understanding of the variations in details.
Student expertly identifies different accounts and their mediums, providing insightful commentary on the nuances and variations in details presented across different mediums.
Student provides no analysis or an inaccurate analysis of the details emphasized in each account.
Student attempts to analyze emphasized details but struggles to provide supporting evidence or reasoning.
Student identifies some emphasized details but lacks depth in explaining why these details are emphasized.
Student adequately analyzes the details emphasized in each account, providing reasonable explanations for their significance.
Student thoroughly analyzes the details emphasized in each account, offering well-supported explanations for their significance and potential biases.
Student provides a comprehensive and insightful analysis of the details emphasized in each account, demonstrating a nuanced understanding of the purpose and impact of these choices.
Student does not attempt to compare accounts across different mediums or provides irrelevant comparisons.
Student attempts to compare accounts but struggles to identify meaningful similarities or differences.
Student identifies basic similarities or differences between accounts in different mediums but lacks deeper understanding.
Student provides a satisfactory comparison of accounts across mediums, highlighting some key similarities and differences.
Student offers a detailed comparison of accounts across mediums, explaining how the medium influences the presentation and interpretation of information.
Student presents a sophisticated comparison of accounts across mediums, demonstrating a nuanced understanding of how each medium shapes the narrative and impacts the audience's perception.
